item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 28, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The UX of Lego Interface Panels (2020) (118 points | 9 comments)

3. In the Rockets' Red Glare: The past and future of hot-rodding in America (9 points | 4 comments)

5. Rapid colonization of a space-returned Ryugu sample by terrestrial microorganism (17 points | 5 comments)

7. Bootkitty: Analyzing the first UEFI bootkit for Linux (75 points | 33 comments)
8. A new start after 60: I became a 'hummingbird' for people with dementia (39 points | 1 comment)
9. Show HN: Myphotos.site – Make a gallery website from Google Photos (129 points | 68 comments)
10. Spatial Pixel: a new kind of social computing (61 points | 17 comments)
11. The great abandonment: what happens to the natural world when people disappear? (19 points | 11 comments)
12. You can use C-Reduce for any language (435 points | 98 comments)

18. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (943 points | 490 comments)
19. PRoot: User-space implementation of chroot, mount –bind, and binfmt_misc (110 points | 39 comments)
20. WasmCloud makes strides with WASM component model (12 points | discuss)
21. Futures and Multiple Values in Parallel Lisp (1991) [pdf] (30 points | discuss)
22. MIT Aluminum Bicycle Project 1974 (2016) (163 points | 123 comments)
23. A washing machine for human beings, from 1970 (100 points | 139 comments)
24. Show HN: Voice-Pro – AI Voice Cloning (211 points | 146 comments)
25. Spotify has shut down several API endpoints (86 points | 70 comments)
26. The Forgotten Story of How IBM Invented the Automated Fab (159 points | 36 comments)
27. Show HN: Feels Like Paper (231 points | 79 comments)
28. Developing a cancer drug without Big Pharma: this hospital shows it can be done (169 points | 125 comments)
29. Where Glaciers Melt, the Rivers Run Red (61 points | 67 comments)
30. Study asks: Can cell phone signals help land a plane? (21 points | 19 comments)
